logistic.R: Campaign-side risks: unsynchronised outreach, missing endorsements, manuscript drift.
logistic.Theta: Parity brief + campaign ledger mirrored with codex entry within 24 h and BreakPoint ritual confirmation.
logistic.zeta: Rises when outreach cadence ignores rituals or telemetry timestamps diverge from bridge.

alerts.title: Parity silence
signals: Campaign compass lacks latest parity brief reference or codex ID (>24h stale).
fallout: Outreach narrates readiness without Θ evidence; partners lose trust.
recovery: Update parity brief + codex entry, refresh campaign compass + sigil, notify UTAC matrix.

alerts.title: Manuscript lag
signals: Finalisierung_Plattform checklist not updated for >1 sprint.
Codex entries omit manuscript milestone references.
fallout: Launch story lacks validated scientific backbone; endorsements stall.
recovery: Re-run manuscript planning session, log BreakPoint ritual, update codex + sigil checkpoints.

alerts.title: Endorsement void
signals: UTAC matrix lacks ΔAIC/impact notes for latest endorsements.
Campaign map missing partner resonance metrics.
fallout: External support fades; launch narrative loses amplification.
recovery: Collect metrics, append to UTAC + map, publish codex addendum, notify shadow contact.

alerts.title: Outreach drift
signals: Outreach cadence log missing parity brief milestones.
No reference to BreakPoint rituals in last communication sprint.
fallout: Community misalignment; risk of promises exceeding readiness.
recovery: Pause outreach, run rituals, rebuild cadence log with parity + codex anchors.

playbooks.response: Freeze public messaging until parity brief + codex echo updated; inform system sigils.
Escalate to editorial lead, schedule catch-up sprint, document ritual outcomes.
Activate campaign recovery kit, reissue cadence plan, capture ΔAIC metrics, notify BreakPoint circle.

null_model.description: Campaign communicates progress without synchronising with parity brief or codex ledger.
risk: Public commitments outpace readiness; trust erodes.
Shadow system cannot trigger recovery in time; ζ(R) grows unchecked.
